title: Afternoon Update: Australia’s climate breakdown risks laid bare; ANZ slapped with record fine; and Adolescence wins big at Emmys

title: Fly, Wild Swans by Jung Chang review – a daughter of China speaks again
summary: The bestselling author explores the transformations in her homeland and reflects on the personal toll of her fame. Her latest work delves into the interplay between her identity and the evolving landscape she once knew. Through this narrative, she captures the complexities of success and its impact on her life.

title: Donald Trump’s UK state visit arrives at awkward moment after Mandelson exit
summary: Peter Mandelson's dismissal due to his association with Jeffrey Epstein is creating controversy that may overshadow the excitement surrounding the US president's upcoming two-day visit. The news raises concerns about the implications of Mandelson's ties and its impact on the political landscape. The president's trip, initially expected to garner significant attention, now faces scrutiny against the backdrop of this scandal.
